title: Nutriota Chromium Picolinate | 250 mcg (365 Tablets)
aboutContent: HIGH CONCENTRATION CHROMIUM PICOLINATE 250 MCG PER TABLET - Our vegan chromium supplement contains 250 mcg of chromium picolinate per tablet. Each bottle contains 365 easy to take tablets, equivalent to a 12 month supply at an excellent value for money. A chromium supplement is essential to help regulate macronutrient metabolism and maintain normal blood glucose levels.
descriptionContent: Chromium is an essential trace element naturally contained in many foods, although in small quantities. Our easy to swallow tablets are suitable for vegetarians and vegans and allow you to benefit from the positive effects of chromium.
ingredientsContent: Chromium picolinate, bulking agents (magnesium salts of fatty acids, calcium phosphates), anti-caking agent (microcrystalline cellulose)
generalInfoContent:
Package Dimensions: 8.7 x 4.6 x 4.5 cm; 54.8 g
Units: 365.00 Count
